On Campus:

  • While on campus, housing accommodations and meals are not included in the Quest costs.
  • Please visit the BYU-Idaho Housing web site for housing information.

    • The Username and Password are Provided In your Packets.
  • If you would like to be added to the list above or to modify an entry, please contact the Continuing Education office at (208) 496-1250 or quest@byui.edu.

At Badger Creek:

Badger Creek is situated at the base of the majestic Teton Mountain Range. It's a postcard-perfect setting for the outdoor enthusiast and the perfect starting point for field trips into the Yellowstone and Teton regions!

  • While at Badger Creek, housing and meals are provided.
  • Students will assist with meal serving, clean-up, and general housekeeping tasks.
  • Badger Creek accommodations are designed to be rustic; it's far from a luxury resort.
  • Young women are housed eight students per room in two bay-styled rooms at the main lodge.
  • Young men stay in small rustic cabins, with two to three students per cabin.

Badger Creek Facilities:

  • The facility features a computer lab with high-speed wireless internet access.
  • Shower and restroom facilities are adjacent to the women's housing, and a short walk from the men's cabins.
  • Washers and dryers are also available free of charge.
